about.title: Overview
about.content: I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer with experience in PHP and its frameworks, MySQL and Node.js as backend and Nuxt.js, Vue.js and Tailwind CSS as frontend. However, I'm always ready to expand my skill set and learn about new technologies. I'm a quick learner and I like to use my time effectively to seek innovative solutions. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!

timeline.title: HTML5 & CSS3
timeline.content: Started learning the basics of Web Development, such as HTML5 and CSS3 front-end languages, got familiar with most of the common HTML tags and CSS features like Flexbox

timeline.title: PHP & MySQL
timeline.content: Got interested in PHP and back-end development overall, learned how Databases works, especially MySQL. Made an E-Commerce Online Shop with its own Content Management System

timeline.title: JavaScript & jQuery
timeline.content: Started learning JavaScript language and its libraries like jQuery. Made my first Full-Stack Web Application with integrated AJAX fetch requests to MySQL queries which operated with database, so I can handle user actions without page refreshing or data loss

timeline.title: Frameworks
timeline.content: Decided to try modern frameworks to save time and increase efficiency. Switched to Tailwind CSS and made a backend project in Nette PHP. Began to enjoy Vue.js with Nuxt.js. This also led me to Node.js environment, which is, after all, an inseparable part of Nuxt.js and I got to web automations using tools like Puppeteer and others...

work.title: Projects
work.content: Following projects showcase my skills and experiences in handling real projects. Each of the listed projects below includes a link to live demo example where you can take a detailed view. Additionally, each project is tagged with programming languages, frameworks or libraries that were primarily used in their development.

projects.title: Chronitask
projects.content: Fully integrated PHP & JavaScript Online to-do task-list website app with secure database connectivity protected against injections and fetch requests with AJAX. User friendly and optimized interface.

projects.title: Germond's Portfolio
projects.content: Professional landing page. Built in Nuxt.js and Vue.js, styled with TailwindCSS. Animated interface with custom components. Contact system linked to PHP API and MySQL. Language Localization.

projects.title: PHP Starter
projects.content: Simple PHP Starter, with its own, ready to go, API and frontend system. Well structured, secured and scalable environment with features like Nette Database Explorer, TailwindCSS, jQuery, etc.

projects.title: Germond's E-Shop
projects.content: E-Commerce Online Shop made in PHP with database that synchronizes user's cart and orders. Includes Content Management System for editing not only products, but also pages and variations.
